title: Transcendent looking for a mid
body:
We are currently looking for a mid main who wants to get better as a team and who's goal is to eventually become challenger.

The champions that will be used frequently will be:

Morgana
Swain
Nidalee/ziggs

We currently have only mid position available.

Top: - whitepumah - Leader
Mid: - 
Jungle: - Zeatious
ADC: - RecoveryShot
Support: A Nice Guy

Keep in mind this is a professionally run team and we are very serious in getting ahead, climbing the ranks and practicing both individually and as a team and as such you will be required to build for the team comp according to what is needed, this information will be given to you in game.

Rank is irrelevant and our goal is challenger.

Contact me with serious enquiries only.

IGN: whitepumah

replies.body: You can't say it's a professionally run team when the leader is bronze 2

I am running it as if it were a professional team whether you like it or not.

Professionals did not become what they were by messing around and having fun until it was handed to them.

Main Mid Laner,
Free nearly everyday, exception of work 1-2 twice a week for about 6hrs
Play all listed champs above plus all other mages.
Happy to build with the team go through strategies and build in a team environment.
Add me Ingame name is: Mister E

I would love to join as a mid player 
Can play just about every mage and some are uncommon picks like my elise mid which i love to do 
in game name - ImDuhN00b 
Im usually free on weekends

Do you mean only on weekends?

Because this will be pretty much daily ranked games and practice etc.

Not some weekend team.
